title: Must Love Humans
description: Only a vampire can love you forever, but will it be Love at First Bite?'Given a second chance at finding true love, Leo finds himself mated to a snarky, werewolf-hustling human librarian. So, as any sane vampire would do, he bets her over a game of pool. If he loses, she gets his money...but if he wins; she has to go on a date with him.Important warning:Before reading this book, have pearls to clutch. You're going to need them. You'll likely never be able to look at a photo booth the same. It is also a choking hazard to eat or drink while reading this story.Must Love Humans is a steamy paranormal romance, featuring characters from the Hells Bells & Demon Deals world created by Amanda Aggie. You do not need to read any of the other books in the series to enjoy it. This story is a fun, spicy read and is intended for readers over the age of 18.
author: Amanda Aggie
